backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, game progress, events, chats, rewards, parental controls, and other app-related types with storage and access control initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three Virtual Pet Hub reaction features with associated file paths, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend pages, hooks, and components including customization, games, data fetching, and visual effects.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React application via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing component loading authentication logic, pages, and all game entries with theme and query providers.
frontend/src/components/AchievementCeleb: UI component that queues and displays confetti or fireworks celebration overlays using portals and timed removal.
Component gating access based on approval status, showing a request-approval flow or rendering children when approved.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/AvatarP: 3D avatar preview component allowing drag rotation and rendering avatar parts based on variant styles.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/AvatarR: Empty or placeholder file for avatar rigging logic.
frontend/src/components/avatar3d/avatarV: Maps avatar configuration values to styled variant objects for body, head, hair, pants, headwear, and shoes.
Displays temporary motivational messages via a portal and exposes a function to queue and show feedback with animations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Provides a game UI wrapper with score display, navigation, trophy updates, and upgrade dialogs for pet-related rewards.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main app header with authentication handling, navigation links, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/HomepageFeatures: Displays a grid of feature cards highlighting various app modules and creative tools.
frontend/src/components/InstantMiniActiv: Implements age‑based mini‑games with separate logic for tapping, matching, or challenge modes using canvas and timers.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/ArtsMu: Implements multiple arts-related mini‑games like color mixing, drawing, rhythm, instruments, and creative prompts with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Discov: Activity component providing facts, how‑it‑works steps, world explorer info, and invention‑based quizzes with scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Readin: Handles phonics, word building, stories, spelling, and vocabulary games with step progression and scoring.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Scienc: Defines a science-themed activity component with multiple game types and interactive steps for lessons.
frontend/src/components/MascotGuide.tsx: Shows a context‑aware mascot helper with optional voice narration and timed visibility.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component that collects a child's name and age, validates input, and saves a user profile via mutateAsync.
frontend/src/content/seasonalEventStorie: Provides a dataset of kid-safe seasonal event stories with narration scripts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePetReaction.ts: Hook managing temporary pet reactions like feed or play with auto-clearing behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains type definitions and helpers for various app data models and queries using actor-based backend access.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, themes, and utility classes including neon and 3D avatar effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard displaying user management, restrictions, activity logs, and status updates using various query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ArtGalleryPage.tsx: Page for uploading, previewing, and submitting artwork with authentication checks and file validation.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarCreatorPage.tsx: Avatar customization page allowing users to edit or randomize 3D avatar parts and save configurations.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Generates and displays downloadable achievement certificates using canvas and user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/ChatModule.tsx: Simple chat interface with contacts, message history, and sending new messages in a monitored environment.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements a real-time chat interface with online user polling, message sending, and auto-scrolling. Uses identity-based principals to send direct messages.
frontend/src/pages/CraftDIYPage.tsx: Displays craft project categories with filtering, mock fallback data, and project completion handling. Allows marking projects as completed and earning badges.
frontend/src/pages/CreativeFunHub.tsx: Shows a hub of creative entertainment modules like interactive shorts and karaoke. Each module card navigates to its respective feature.
frontend/src/pages/DanceChallengePage.ts: Provides dance routines with timed pose progression and optional camera usage. Users can select routines, start/stop playback, and view poses step-by-step.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with searchable module cards for games, creativity tools, learning, and more. Supports admin-only modules and identity-based access.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardCreator.tsx: Lets users design event cards with templates, fonts, borders, and stickers. Supports previewing, downloading, and sharing cards with validation.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardsPage.tsx: Provides a UI for creating customizable event cards with templates, colors, and downloadable output using forms and tabs.
frontend/src/pages/EventsModule.tsx: Manages a list of events with creation, date selection, categorization, and rendering of event cards including type-based styling.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays and manages events with reminders, date pickers, notifications, and CRUD-like form interactions.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackPage.tsx: Implements a feedback submission form using API hooks and displays existing user feedback.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackSystem.tsx: Provides an alternate feedback form with satisfaction ratings, type selection, and optional anonymity.
frontend/src/pages/FunnyFartHub.tsx: Renders a hub of selectable fart sound buttons with playback, randomization, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/games/AmbulanceRescue: Implements a timed rescue game where the player moves an ambulance to collect randomly spawning patients and tracks score and high score.
frontend/src/pages/games/BalloonPop.tsx: Runs an animated balloon‑popping game using requestAnimationFrame, spawning balloons with types and scoring based on clicks.
frontend/src/pages/games/BibbleAdventure: Creates a platformer where the player jumps across platforms to collect coins while managing gravity and collision.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeDec: Lets users click to place emoji decorations on a cake, accumulating score and saving a high score on finish.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeMak: Guides players through sequential steps to build a custom cake, earning points for each choice until completion.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossesLearnHabi: Defines a game where the boss learns player movement patterns and predicts attacks while the player shoots and dodges.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossFightOnly.t: Implements a boss‑only combat game with player movement, boss phases, projectiles, and reversible controls across multiple boss levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/CatGrapplingHoo: Implements a physics‑based grappling hook game with a cat, collectible food, moving enemies, and momentum mechanics.
frontend/src/pages/games/CityMovingPlatf: Provides a platformer with rotating platforms, gravity, movement, and scoring based on horizontal progress.
Creates a game where the player indirectly guides a character by controlling enemies to clear a path toward a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/CronkerKontry.t: Idle resource-building game managing gold, food, power, buildings, upgrades, achievements, and prestige with incremental production loops.
frontend/src/pages/games/DelayedControls: Canvas-based movement game where inputs are delayed before execution, featuring obstacles, coins, and a goal area.
frontend/src/pages/games/DungeonJanitorS: Top-down cleaning game where the player moves around a dungeon clearing debris for points while new debris periodically spawns.
Arcade survival shooter with enemy spawning, energy orb collection, AI hints, projectiles, and adaptive difficulty.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemiesPlatform: Platformer where flying enemies act as moving platforms, with jumping, collision handling, and level-based enemy generation.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemyControlsCa: Canvas-based game where an enemy controls the camera while the player collects coins and avoids being caught; tracks score, high score, and game over state.
frontend/src/pages/games/EscapeRoomUnive: Multi-room escape game with timed item finding, room unlocking, scoring, and inventory progression across themed rooms.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingBreak: Platformer where platforms break after use; player navigates physics-based movement to reach a goal while score and levels track progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingIsBut: Game filled with clickable buttons triggering random actions like teleporting or revealing the goal while player moves on canvas.
frontend/src/pages/games/FamousPlaces.ts: Multiple-choice quiz game about identifying famous places, tracking score, high score, and progressing through questions.
frontend/src/pages/games/FinalBoss.tsx: Canvas defense game where players place traps to stop heroes from damaging a boss, with waves, scoring, and trap selection.
frontend/src/pages/games/FloorIsLiar.tsx: Platformer where players jump across misleadingly labeled platforms to reach a goal, with levels, gravity, and collision checks.
frontend/src/pages/games/ForestNight.tsx: Top-down movement game where players collect coins in low visibility before time runs out, with dynamic light radius and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/GadgetCombat.ts: Arena game where players use gadgets to stun or capture enemies that chase them, with cooldowns, spawning, and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/GlitchWorldEsca: Platformer with glitch mode that toggles which platforms are solid while managing jumps, gravity, and falling hazards.
frontend/src/pages/games/GrandmaSecretAr: Canvas-based arcade hub featuring three mini-games (whack-a-mole, catch, memory) with shared state and click-based interactions.
frontend/src/pages/games/InventoryIsEnem: Movement and survival game where inventory weight slows the player and causes damage while navigating enemies and collecting items.
frontend/src/pages/games/LiesAndTruths.t: Platformer with randomized true/false hints affecting platform safety and progression toward a goal area.
frontend/src/pages/games/MemoryMatch.tsx: Emoji-based memory matching game with increasing grid size, scoring, level progression, and flip/match logic.
Room-based puzzle game where each room contains a color, pattern, or sequence puzzle that must be solved to clear all rooms.
frontend/src/pages/games/MonsterMaze.tsx: Canvas maze game where the player moves through a grid avoiding moving monsters and reaching an exit while tracking score and high score.
frontend/src/pages/games/MoveWhenBlink.t: Canvas action game where the player can move only while blinking, avoiding moving enemies and reaching a goal to score points.
frontend/src/pages/games/NumberRunner.ts: Lane‑running math game that spawns obstacles with math questions the player must answer while lanes shift and speed increases.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneButtonHero.t: One‑button timing game where tap, short hold, or long hold triggers jump, dash, or shield as obstacles spawn and score increases.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneRoomInfinite: Single‑room engine that cycles through multiple mini‑games including dodge, collect, memory, and platforming while tracking score and timers.
frontend/src/pages/games/PacMan.tsx: Implements a grid‑based Pac‑Man clone with movement, ghosts, pellets, keyboard input, and maze initialization using React state and animation loops.
frontend/src/pages/games/PauseMechanic.t: Canvas game where the player collects coins and avoids hazards, featuring a pause system that triggers random effects like spawn, rewind, or teleport.
frontend/src/pages/games/PoliceBuddyChas: Lane‑based chasing game where the player moves left/right to catch criminals while avoiding escapes, with increasing speed and score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/PumpkinSmash.ts: Canvas clicker game where bouncing pumpkins move around and the player clicks them to score before time expires.
frontend/src/pages/games/ReverseProgress: Platformer where abilities are removed each level, with player movement, platforms, enemies, and ability‑based mechanics like dash, shield, and slow‑time.
frontend/src/pages/games/ScreenIsEnemy.t: Canvas-based game where a player moves, collects coins, and triggers random screen effects while tracking score and game state.
frontend/src/pages/games/ShapeShiftingWo: Top-down game where the player shifts forms to bypass obstacles and collect items across increasing levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/SlimeEvolutionA: Canvas arena game where a slime evolves forms, avoids or interacts with enemies, and survives to increase score.
frontend/src/pages/games/SoundBasedWorld: Movement-and-sound-wave puzzle game where the player navigates obstacles and uses sound waves to reach a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceInvaders.t: Classic Space Invaders clone with waves, shooting, enemy movement, score tracking, and player lives.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceStationLif: A resource‑management game where roles, random events, and movement affect score, resources, and survival over time.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpeedIsHealth.t: A canvas-based game where the player moves to maintain health, avoid obstacles, and collect coins while tracking score and speed.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpiderWebPuzzle: A puzzle game generating random node webs where players disconnect linked nodes to free all nodes across levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperpowerTrain: A side-scrolling obstacle game where players use unlocked powers to avoid threats, hit targets, and increase score and level.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperSpeedyRace: A lane-based dodging racer where obstacles spawn, speed increases with score, and collisions end the run.
frontend/src/pages/games/Tetris.tsx: Implements a full Tetris game with board state, piece spawning, movement, rotation, collision, scoring, and game loop handling via refs and animation frames.
frontend/src/pages/games/ThemeParkBuilde: A park‑building sim where players place rides, earn income, manage happiness and visitors, and risk game over if happiness drops.
frontend/src/pages/games/TicTacToe.tsx: A Tic‑Tac‑Toe game supporting PvP and AI modes with winner detection, draw logic, and basic AI move selection.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeControlAdve: A realtime action game with time‑manipulation powers, enemy spawning, projectiles, coins, difficulty scaling, and a continuous game loop.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeLoopPizzaDe: A canvas‑based delivery game where the player delivers pizzas, avoids obstacles, and resets via time loops when the timer expires.
frontend/src/pages/games/TinyHeroGiantWo: Canvas platformer where a tiny player navigates a giant world, collects coins, and reaches a goal with physics, collisions, and camera tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/TutorialIsVilla: Top‑down game where a deceptive tutorial spawns traps and hazards as the player moves toward a goal, with evolving messages and interactions.
frontend/src/pages/games/WordWizard.tsx: Word‑scramble game where players form words from shuffled letters under a timer, tracking score, high score, and found words.
frontend/src/pages/games/YoureLateAlways: Chaos‑survival game where the player dodges projectiles, fires, and explosions while progressing through escalating levels.
frontend/src/pages/GamesHub.tsx: Displays a grid of selectable games with icons and categories, handling trial limits and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/GamesModule.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface listing games by type with progress, difficulty, and selection handling.
frontend/src/pages/GreenScreenFunPage.ts: Allows users to upload or capture a photo and overlay it onto cartoon scenes with download support.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveShortsPage: Implements branching interactive stories with scene choices, endings, and story selection.
frontend/src/pages/JokesGenerator.tsx: Local joke generator with category filtering, random selection, favorites, sharing, and audio mock actions.
frontend/src/pages/JokesPage.tsx: Joke management page using API queries for browsing, submitting, rating, favoriting, and randomizing jokes.
frontend/src/pages/KaraokeModePage.tsx: Karaoke interface letting users pick songs, display timed lyrics, and control playback and volumes.
frontend/src/pages/LearnHubPage.tsx: Learning hub organizing themed lesson categories with progress tracking and activity components.
frontend/src/pages/MusicRemixPage.tsx: Music remix creation tool with loop selection, audio mixing, playback visualization, and remix submission.
frontend/src/pages/ParentalControl.tsx: Provides parental control UI for screen time, content filters, chat/video toggles, and admin user approvals using backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/PreLoginExperiencePag: Displays a pre-login landing page with hero content, optional redirect message, and Internet Identity login flow.
Allows users to edit and save profile details such as name, age, avatar, and theme using backend profile queries.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsAchievements.t: Shows static achievements, badges, points, levels, and progress within a rewards dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Fetches dynamic game stats and rewards to display earned badges, scores, and virtual pet progress with celebration effects.
frontend/src/pages/ScaryHub.tsx: Renders a themed hub showing spooky mini‑games with sound toggles, animated background effects, and surprise pop‑ups. Handles navigation and UI theming for each game card.
frontend/src/pages/SeasonalEventsPage.ts: Displays seasonal activities, decorations, and stories based on the current month with tabs, dialogs, and interactive completion flow. Manages activity states, toast feedback, and event themes.
frontend/src/pages/SmartHubPage.tsx: Provides a smart activity hub that lists games and learning items with filtering, recommendations, and user progress data. Integrates queries for game states and rewards to personalize suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/SpinWheelPage.tsx: Implements a spin‑the‑wheel reward mechanic with cooldown tracking, animations, and reward handling. Saves spin timing in localStorage and shows prize history.
frontend/src/pages/StickerCreatorPage.ts: Offers a canvas‑based drawing tool for creating stickers with adjustable brushes, colors, saving, and retrieval of approved stickers. Handles precise input events and canvas rendering logic.
frontend/src/pages/StoryBuilderPage.tsx: Interactive story builder that manages scenes, elements, and saving story projects via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGenerator.tsx: Simple video generator UI for selecting templates, characters, and stickers, with basic validation and preview placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGeneratorPage.ts: Generates animated video frames from user input and renders them on a canvas with play controls.
frontend/src/pages/VideoHubPage.tsx: Displays categorized kid-friendly YouTube channels with selection dialogs and navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualPetHubPage.tsx: Manages a virtual pet’s state, customization, rewards, and creation flow using backend queries and mutations.
frontend/src/utils/avatarConfig.ts: Utility functions providing default avatar parts and merging user avatar config with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL and sessionStorage helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color palette, neon effects, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, known issues, existing features, and new feature requests for the Art Gallery and Virtual Pet Hub.
